summary: give you a list of all material you need to make armor and weapon
descriptionHtml:
okay guys this is just a small bat it contain about 40 material to make weapon and armor i hope you like it it my first upload this is not considerate a mod it\'s just a batch file.

installation:
copy the  Materia.txt into the skyrim directory.
open the game and click ~ when you start and write bat material
author: ToxikShot
